headline.print_headline: BEHAVIOR: Young Marijuana Users Pay Cognitive Price
headline.seo: Marijuana Users Who Started Early Show Brain Function Deficit, Study Says
headline.main: Behavior: Young Marijuana Users Pay Cognitive Price

docs.lead_paragraph: Those who began smoking before age 16 performed the worst on tests assessing brain function, researchers say.
docs.snippet: Those who began smoking before age 16 performed the worst on tests assessing brain function, researchers say.
